org.epics.vtype

Interface Alarm

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    VBoolean, VBooleanArray, VByte, VByteArray, VDouble, VDoubleArray, VEnum, VEnumArray, VExtendedAlarm.AlarmCondition, VFloat, VFloatArray, VInt, VIntArray, VLong, VLongArray, VMultiDouble, VMultiEnum, VMultiInt, VMultiString, VNumber, VNumberArray, VShort, VShortArray, VStatistics, VString, VStringArray
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlarmTimeDisplayExtractor, AlarmTimeExtractor, PVFieldNTHistogramToVIntArray, PVFieldNTHistogramToVLongArray, PVFieldNTHistogramToVShortArray, PVFieldNTMatrixToVDoubleArray, PVFieldToVBoolean, PVFieldToVByte, PVFieldToVByteArray, PVFieldToVDouble, PVFieldToVDoubleArray, PVFieldToVEnum, PVFieldToVFloat, PVFieldToVFloatArray, PVFieldToVInt, PVFieldToVIntArray, PVFieldToVLong, PVFieldToVLongArray, PVFieldToVShort, PVFieldToVShortArray, PVFieldToVStatistics, PVFieldToVString, PVFieldToVStringArray

    public interface Alarm
    Alarm information. Represents the severity and name of the highest alarm associated with the channel.
    Author:
    carcassi

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAlarmName()
      Returns a brief text representation of the highest currently active alarm.
      AlarmSeverity getAlarmSeverity()
      Returns the alarm severity, which describes the quality of the value returned.
